attributes.action: give people a vote on the final Brexit deal with an option to remain in the EU
attributes.additional_details: The electoral commission found inconsistencies with spending, leading people had been found and admitted to lying, and it’s very possible a lot of dark money was invested into the original referendum
attributes.background: The referendum was flawed and as time goes on we find more and more untruths to how it was funded and manipulated. People could have voted based on lies and manipulation. Let’s have a People’s vote on the final deal with an option to remain
